LanguageData.HidePawnNameTooltip: Hide Pawn's name when displaying its silhouette.
LanguageData.ZoomDebugMessageTooltip: Displays the current zoom as a message.
LanguageData.AutoOffFollowTooltip: If you are not selecting your pawn, turns off Following automatically.
LanguageData.CameraSpeedSettingsTooltip: Adjust the camera movement speed for each zoom level. This controls camera movement speed, not zoom speed. You can check the current zoom level via the "Zoom Debug Message" option.
LanguageData.HideBracketTooltip: The pawn selection border disappears while the camera follows.
LanguageData.DisplayDistanceTooltip: Display distance for item quantities and progress bars
